.slider .slider-control-bottomcenter button{color:#fff!important;text-shadow:0 0 1px rgba(0,0,0,.75);transition:text-shadow .3s ease}.slider .slider-control-bottomcenter button:hover{text-shadow:0 0 4px #000}.slider-list{touch-action:auto!important}.slider .slider-control-centerleft button:focus,.slider .slider-control-centerright button:focus,.slider:focus{outline:none}@media (min-width:375px) and (max-width:420px){.slider-control-centerleft,.slider-control-centerright{top:72%!important}}.root{color:#c00;font-weight:700}.numbersDate{font-size:1.8rem}.lettersDate{font-size:.8rem}.dayDate{margin-right:2.7rem}.hoursDate{margin-right:1.9rem}.minutesDate{margin-right:1.8rem}.card_panel&gt;div{position:relative;height:43%;padding:0}.card_panel_form&gt;div{height:52%}.card_panel_img{margin-bottom:8%}.card_panel_img&gt;div:first-child{padding:1rem 2rem 2rem}.card_panel_img img{width:5rem}.card_panel&gt;div:first-child{height:14%;margin-bottom:2rem}.card_panel.card_panel_no_cta&gt;div:nth-child(2){max-height:25%}.card_panel&gt;.card_panel_cta{-webkit-align-items:flex-end;align-items:flex-end;display:-webkit-flex;display:flex}.new{position:absolute;left:50%;-webkit-transform:translate(-50%,-1.5em);transform:translate(-50%,-1.5em);font-weight:700}.discover{color:#fff;text-decoration:underline}.discover:hover{font-weight:700}#outdated{font-family:"Open Sans","Segoe UI",sans-serif;position:absolute;background-color:rgba(204,0,0,.95)!important;color:#fff;display:none;overflow:hidden;left:0;position:fixed;text-align:center;text-transform:uppercase;top:0;width:100%;z-index:1500;padding:0 24px 24px 0}
